L ocated in the heart of Boca Raton , Bocaire has the reputation of having one of the warmest, most welcoming neighborhood atmospheres in all of South Florida. This sophisticated community is truly a country club paradise. Bocaire Homes for Sale Bocaire September 10, 2025 7 Listed 91 Avg. DOM $586.85 Avg. $ / Sq.Ft. $2,499,000 Med. These luxurious homes boast many designer finishes and upscale interior features. Some of the features commonly found in Bocaire homes for sale include: Chef-inspired kitchens with stainless steel appliances Granite counters in kitchens and baths High-end tile and hardwood flooring Soaring vaulted ceilings Floor to ceiling windows providing ample natural light Spacious master suites with custom walk-in closets Luxurious marble baths Every home in Bocaire Country Club offers gorgeous views of rolling golf course greens, shimmering lakes, and/or the community's lush tropical landscape. With meticulously-maintained, large private lots , many of the homes also feature outdoor living spaces perfect for entertaining, as well as summer kitchens and private swimming pools. Bocaire Country Club Membership & Amenities Bocaire Country Club is known for its professional service and luxurious world-class amenities that provide members with the ultimate South Florida country club lifestyle. The r ecently refurbished 18-hole golf course was designed by legendary golf architect Joe Lee and has essentially no tee times. With an excellent teaching staff, a fully stocked pro shop, designated chipping and putting areas, driving range, and bunker practice area, Bocaire caters to golfers of all levels . Tennis at Bocaire is also spectacular , as the community offers everything from private and group lessons to active league play, as well as seasonal tennis events held throughout the year. There is a fully stocked pro shop with top-of-the-line tennis gear and apparel, and of course, five lighted Har-Tru clay tennis courts. The resort-style aquatic center is one of the newest and most luxurious additions to Bocaire and features a beautiful beach entry pool. The 4,300 square foot fitness center features state-of-the-art weight training and cardio equipment, a full staff of certified personal trainers, and a host of group fitness classes including aerobics, Zumba, Pilates, and Yoga. The fitness center also has a luxurious spa that offers a wide range of relaxing spa services. In addition to these services and amenities, the 36,000 square foot clubhouse offers year-round exquisite dining in multiple venues and an extensive calendar of social events . Residents take part in dinner shows and seasonal celebrations, caviar and vodka tastings, family programs, and a variety of card games. With only 240 resident members , Bocaire strives to provide the highest level of service and top-rated amenities to ensure an exceptional member experience. Bocaire Country Club Location Located off of Military Trail in the heart of Boca Raton, Bocaire is just minutes away from all that you could ever ask for in South Florida. Bocaire is conveniently located near some of the area's finest shopping, dining, and entertainment options, as well as  the following attractions and activities in Boca Raton: South Florida Beaches Boca Raton Community Parks Mizner Park Boca Raton Resort & Club Gumbo Limbo Nature Center Boca Town Center Mall Boca Raton Museum of Art iPic movie theaters I95 and Florida's Turnpike for easy getaways Top-rated area schools Bocaire Country Club is definitely an ideal place to call home for those seeking an active, friendly, and luxurious lifestyle . If Bocaire sounds like the perfect country club community to call home, you may want to visit similar country club communities in Boca Raton , such as Polo Club and Woodfield Country Club , both of which also offer a beautiful selection of luxurious homes, world-class amenities, and a friendly, welcoming atmosphere. Contact Us About BocaIre Country Club Living in Bocaire Country Club provides the ultimate luxurious and exclusive country club lifestyle that one would expect from a private club of this caliber. If you would like to learn more about Bocaire or any of the other developments in Boca Raton , please contact us at 561-998-9015 . You may also reach us by completing the online contact form below, and one of our experienced agents will promptly reach out to assist you. We at Champagne & Parisi Real Estate pride ourselves on our market knowledge, industry expertise, and our commitment to providing exceptional customer service. We look forward to assisting you in finding your next South Florida dream home! Bocaire Country Club - bocaratonobserver.com Skip to main content Search Subscribe facebook instagram RSS Culture Buzz Destinations Features Style Wellness Food & Drink Bites Cheers Chef Profile Readers’ Choice Restaurant Guide Restaurant News Review Community Around Town Community News Flash Giving Back La Vida Boca Happenings Calendar Editor's Corner Out 'N' About Guides Charity Country Clubs Education Top Docs Top Lawyers Visitors Profiles Country Club Collection Cuisine Scene Health Care Heroes Inspired Home Men On The Move Power Players Professional Edge Top Docs Top Lawyers Wonder Women Fresh Picks Country Club Collection Cuisine Scene Health Care Heroes Inspired Home Men On The Move Power Players Professional Edge Top Docs Top Lawyers Wonder Women Home Profiles Bocaire Country Club Bocaire Country Club November 22, 2024 7:04 AM RSS Print × Expand Located in Boca Raton, just south of Delray Beach, Bocaire Country Club offers an intimate and boutique-style club experience that epitomizes South Florida luxury. Known for its exceptional service and amenities, Bocaire is a haven for members seeking a sense of community within an exclusive setting. With 240 custom-built estate homes set on at least one-third of an acre amid fairways, lakes and landscaped golf course beds, Bocaire offers a picturesque and spacious environment. × Expand “Together we are Bocaire,” says General Manager Loraine Vienne, reflecting the camaraderie that unites members. This inclusive atmosphere makes Bocaire a unique community where everyone feels at home. The stunning golf course designed by Kipp Schulties, features some of Boca Raton’s highest elevations. The course is a draw for golfers of all levels, complemented by an excellent teaching staff, fully equipped golf shop and practice areas for chipping, putting and driving. × Expand × Expand For those who enjoy racquet sports, Bocaire’s tennis and pickleball facilities offer both group and private lessons, league play and seasonal events on Har-Tru clay courts and tournament-style pickleball courts. “The country club industry is evolving, and Bocaire is leading these changes in a boutique community setting,” says Vienne. The resort-style aquatic center boasts a beach-entry pool with lap lanes, while the 4,300-square-foot fitness center includes state-of-the-art weight and cardio equipment, personal trainers and classes like Spin, Zumba, Pilates and yoga. Newly added treatment rooms provide a variety of wellness services from massages to facials. × Expand The 36,000-square-foot clubhouse offers fine and casual dining, a vibrant indoor-outdoor bar with views of the 18th hole and an array of social events including dinner shows, lunch and learn programs and speaker series. With a rotating menu and seasonal celebrations, Bocaire’s culinary offerings are diverse and innovative. Looking ahead to 2025, Bocaire plans to expand its programming with additional wellness classes, cultural tours and a broader array of nongolf activities, reinforcing its commitment to an inclusive club culture. Bocaire Country Club, 4989 Bocaire Blvd., Boca Raton, 561-997-6556, bocairecc.com Get directions and contact information from the directory listing . Bocaire Country Club - bocaratonobserver.com Skip to main content Search Subscribe facebook instagram RSS Culture Buzz Destinations Features Style Wellness Food & Drink Bites Cheers Chef Profile Readers’ Choice Restaurant Guide Restaurant News Review Community Around Town Community News Flash Giving Back La Vida Boca Happenings Calendar Editor's Corner Out 'N' About Guides Charity Country Clubs Education Top Docs Top Lawyers Visitors Profiles Country Club Collection Cuisine Scene Health Care Heroes Inspired Home Men On The Move Power Players Professional Edge Top Docs Top Lawyers Wonder Women Fresh Picks Home Bocaire Country Club Bocaire Country Club 4989 Bocaire Blvd. , Boca Raton , Florida 33487 Print Photos Map × 1 of 5 × 2 of 5 × 3 of 5 × 4 of 5 × 5 of 5 Prev Next Nearby Nearby Events Address 4989 Bocaire Blvd. , Boca Raton , Florida 33487 Phone 561-997-6556 Visit Website Together We Are Bocaire Located in Boca Raton, just south of Delray Beach, Bocaire is perfectly situated near world-class restaurants, amazing shopping, cultural centers, and of course, beautiful beaches. Bocaire is an exclusive, private club with a limited number of memberships. With 238 custom-built estate homes each set on a minimum of 1/3 acre amidst magnificent fairways, serene lakes, and beautiful landscaping, you’ll see that every detail has been meticulously considered. Members and guests receive exceptional and personal attention from our professional staff who take pride in ensuring incredible service is always the rule, never the exception. “Bocaire is a welcoming community. It does not feel pretentious or cold. The new golf course is spectacular, the members are social and easy going, and the size of the community is ideal. There is something for everyone in our family to enjoy. We happen to love tennis and golf, our kids enjoy basketball, and we all love the food and events!” - FIVE YEAR RESIDENT The Challenge at Bocaire Bocaire’s impressive $8 million dollar golf course designed by Kipp Schulties, features some of the highest elevations in the area. No tee times or reservations are ever needed, so if you can only play 4 holes after work, you’re free to do so! This is truly golf at your leisure, your pace, and your level. The Challenge is aesthetically pleasing with rolling hills, rock walls, strategically placed water vistas, and bunkers. Members enjoy generous family golf privileges without green fees for parents, children, or grandchildren—Bocaire is golf, played well. Social Offerings & Exquisite Dining With a packed calendar of social events and entertainment, life is never dull at Bocaire. For those seeking a more active community life, Bocaire offers a wide array of functions in addition to sports such as themed dinners, elegant gala events, charity functions, caviar, vodka and wine tastings, and more. Bocaire offers casual or elegant indoor dining with exquisite cuisine year-round. Bocaire’s renowned Executive Chef has over 20 years of experience. His talented culinary team uses the freshest and finest ingredients to create distinctive lunch and dinner menus as well as our signature Sunday Brunch that is not to be missed. Pride In Who We Are Combined with exceptional, individualized service and a full calendar of social events and activities, Bocaire is the Country Club you’ve been looking for. At Bocaire, you belong to more than just a country club—you are part of a community. For more information, call 561-998-1615 or visit membership@bocairecc.com . Description Bocaire Country Club in Boca Raton, Florida, offers an exceptional 18-hole golf experience designed to impress both seasoned players and newcomers. Known as "The Challenge at Bocaire," this championship course underwent a stunning $8 million renovation, reopening in January 2019. The redesign elevated every aspect of the course, blending strategic playability with breathtaking aesthetics. Golfers can enjoy meticulously maintained fairways, expertly crafted bunkers, and challenging greens tailored for all skill levels.  

Complement your round with access to world-class practice facilities, including a driving range and short-game areas designed to refine your skills. The elegant clubhouse offers luxurious amenities such as fine dining, a pro shop, and spaces to relax after your game, making Bocaire a premier destination for locals and visitors alike. Nestled in Boca Raton’s sunny paradise, Bocaire Country Club delivers an unforgettable golfing experience in one of Florida's most vibrant regions. Bocaire Country club offers a wide variety of recreational and leisure activities for the entire family to enjoy year round. Bocaire's Clubhouse provides gala social events including full-service formal dining, grill room, lounge, card rooms, fitness center and locker rooms. The tennis complex features six lighted Har-Tru courts with two on-site tennis professionals and seasonal men's and women's tennis programs. Golf and tennis pro shops are also available with full-service as well as valet parking. Boca Country Club Homes for Sale | Boca Raton Real Estate HOME Login / Register contact us 561.998.9015 ENGLISH 中文 FRANÇAIS 한국어 ITALIANO 日本語 DEUTSCH PORTUGUÊS РУССКИЙ ESPAÑOL TIẾNG VIỆT Champagne & Parisi Search Homes Condos Townhomes Agents Resources Contact Boca Raton Real Estate Search Home Homes Boca Country Club Boca Country Club Boca Country Club, previously referred to as Boca Raton Golf & Tennis Club, is widely known as one of the best value country club communities in Boca Raton, FL. Country club membership is not mandatory for residents, making Boca Country Club a popular choice for those who want to live in a gated country club-style community without the expensive membership fees. Boca Country Club features a 24-hour manned gated entrance and is situated on a vast expanse of lush Florida landscape, with incredible lakes located near the border of Delray Beach & Boca Raton, FL. Boca Country Club Homes For Sale Boca Country Club features almost 1,000 residences that were constructed in the late '80s and early '90s , including condominiums, villas, coach homes, townhomes , and single-family homes for sale. The residences at Boca Country Club are spread throughout 12 distinct villages, each of which boasts a unique character and charm. The diverse selection of residences in Boca Country Club ranges from 1,300 to just over 3,000 square feet of living space, though all offer beautiful views of the surrounding community and golf course, providing the sense of living in a tropical paradise. 1 2 Next The ViLLAGES Of Boca Country Club The villages within Boca Country Club include: Antigua Point: offers a beautiful selection of one-story, single-family homes, many of which boast beautiful golf course and lake views. Balboa Point: features single-family homes on larger lots surrounded by amazing golf course views and beautiful lakes. Bermuda Village: this pet-friendly community offers 61 private courtyard villas with detached guesthouses. Candlewood: this village is made up of one- and two-story townhouses as well as one- and two-story courtyard homes. Eastbrooke: this small village consists of 36 coach homes with private driveways, garages, and panoramic views. Fairways: this family-friendly community consists of 13 multi-unit buildings with large patios and private balconies. Mykonos Court: this Grecian style village consists of 66 charming courtyard homes. Somerset ABC: consists of 37 villa-style semi-attached one- and two-story homes, as well as 88 private condominiums. SpyGlass Walk: this charming village consists of two mid-rise condominium buildings featuring excellent views from wrap-around balconies. St. Tropez: this quiet community features 117 one- and two-story coach homes and attached villas. The Greens: this community features 61 exclusive townhomes featuring one- and two-car garages. Tiffany Trace: this unique community offers three- to four-bedroom single-patio homes as well as two-story townhomes with volume ceilings and breathtaking views. Boca Country Club Location Boca Country Club is ideally situated in a central location near the border of Delray Beach-Boca Raton. Just minutes away are the gorgeous South Florida coastline and pristine local beaches, the famous Atlantic Avenue in Delray, I-95, Florida's Turnpike, and some of the best dining and shopping options in the area. The community is also zoned for some of Boca Raton's top-rated public schools, including Calusa Elementary School , Omni Middle School , and Spanish River Community High School . Overall, living in Boca Country Club provides residents and members with an extravagant lifestyle, a picturesque environment, and beautifully-designed homes. If Boca Country Club sounds like the perfect community to suit your home buying needs and your desired lifestyle, you may want to explore other country club communities in Boca Raton including Boca Pointe and Boca Greens which also do not currently require club membership for homeowners.
